thread.section_title: The Hide London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely boutique hotel - Review of The Hide London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: lovetravelslove
title: Lovely boutique hotel
text:
What we liked:
1. Lovely boutique hotel
2. Very comfy bed
3. Enjoyed the daily refills of drinks in the mini-fridge
4. Really appreciate the parlines set out on our arrival
5. Really appreciate the early check-in as we arrived 1030am and thinking to drop the car and the luggages, but we were offered another room to settle in
6. Happy with the L'occitane toiletries
7. Free parking
8. Breakfast included - great cappuccino!
What we didn't:
1. Our toiletries were not filled up daily
2. Location is slightly away from downtown, travel at night was almost an hour from Soho area
